name: Evolve (itch) (sipsop)
description:
Pick 100 food to reach next level.

Main keys:

LEFT: ArrowLEFT, Z.
RIGHT: ArrowRIGHT, C.
UP, JUMP (when available) Arrow UP, S, Space
DOWN (when available) Arrow DOWN, X.

A small project completely playable made for Timdred Jam.
Theme was Point of no return, evolution is a point of no return and i tried to make it as enjoyable as possible.

I think it is possible to make a larger project of this.

If you enjoy playing it please let me a comment.
